TopicTitle: [Space Plan] THE FLYING COFFIN, can go around Kerbin unlimited times! Unlimited fuel!

Articles.Content:
The Flying Coffin does not use fuel what so ever, it instead uses the power of gravity! It's extremely stable and can reach an altitude of 7-15 KM depending on how you fly it.

Power by alternating the W and S keys, or just do a back flip and it accelerates to extremely high speeds.

Very fast, 15 gees.

High altitude.

Download: http://www./?l3roese413ldqn1

I didn't know about infinigliders awesome and fun plane man!

Yeah, this bug/exploit is one of the most entertaining aerodynamic eccentricities in the game right now. I agree that this plane is unusually well constructed and neat-looking for a craft of its type, nicely done.

In other words, gravity.

No, this has nothing to do with gravity! Learn your physics! In KSP there is an infinite energy source which can be converted into other types of energy like kinetic. Usually an aircraft uses electricity to power flaps, ailerons, elevons. Also they don't move so fast like in KSP. In ksp, they don't consume that giving you endless kinetic power. Gravity doesn't matter. Conversion of infinite energy into other forms of it is key here.
